Peaceful Resolution of Conflicts: If all humans suddenly became pacifists, conflicts would be resolved peacefully and without violence. They would negotiate, compromise, and find solutions that would benefit everyone involved.
End of Wars: With all humans becoming pacifists, the end of wars would be inevitable. They would put aside their differences and work towards creating a peaceful and harmonious world.
Reduction of Crime Rates: Pacifism would reduce the crime rate as people would prefer non-violent means of resolving disputes.
Increase in Empathy and Understanding: Pacifism would increase empathy and understanding among humans as they would learn to see things from other people's perspectives.
Global Unity: All humans becoming pacifists would lead to global unity as they would work towards creating a world where everyone is at peace and can live together without any conflicts.
